name: Sheriff and Desperado and the Fate of the Stolen Car
name_original: Sheriff and Desperado and the Fate of the Stolen Car
description:
Catdad Sean's car has been STOLEN! It's up to Sheriff and Despy to find it and bring it back home.

Lovingly crafted for the Dayknight Festival Gamejam 2019.  You can also check out the code for this game over on my github.

Note: I totally ran out of time and this does not comply with the 4-color challenge rule 😓
